Description.Name: Jeremidious
Description.Details:
Jeremidious and his brother Austinian, were raised for the early parts of their lives on New Olympia, in Marik space.  Much to their motherâ€™s dismay, the two children aimed to follow their father Hairhelmet and become mechwarriors.  She would much rather have had them peacefully remain back and work the land of the agri-domes and spend time fishing. 

Though his brother was too young, Jeremidious was able to train at the Allison Mechwarrior Institute.  He preferred big bruising mechs with lots of firepower and armor.  With the rumors of the Clans coming, though, the family had to abandon New Olympia and he set out to with them to make their fortunes with the mercenary companies among the stars.
